Bed Panes.name: Bedpane Female
Bed Panes.description: A female bedpan is a shallow, ergonomically designed container used by women for toileting while bedridden. Typically made of durable stainless steel or plastic, it features a shape tailored for comfort and ease of use in a lying or sitting position. It is commonly used in hospitals, nursing homes, and home care settings.

Bed Panes.name: Bedpane Female Seamless
Bed Panes.description: A female bedpan is a shallow, ergonomically designed container used by women for toileting while bedridden. Typically made of durable stainless steel or plastic, it features a shape tailored for comfort and ease of use in a lying or sitting position. It is commonly used in hospitals, nursing homes, and home care settings.

Bed Panes.name: Bedpane Male
Bed Panes.description: A male bedpan is a portable container designed for men to urinate or defecate while confined to bed. Made of stainless steel or plastic, it has a contoured shape for comfort and ease of use. Commonly used in hospitals, nursing homes, and home care, it facilitates hygiene and convenience for bedridden patients.

Surgical Trays.name: Kidney Tray
Surgical Trays.description: Kideny Tray is a top-grade medical surgical instrument tray with a focus on safe and systematic handling of surgical instruments. It is made from high-grade stainless steel or medical plastic, making it hygienic, durable, and easily sterilizable. Suitable for use in hospitals, clinics, and surgical facilities, the tray makes medical procedures more efficient.
